name: Don't Spend All Your Coins
description:
I strongly recommend playing on Window Version. Because there is an animation bug on WebGL when your FPS is too low. I am so sorry for who cannot have the best gaming experience due to this issue! The theme: The game is a liar

This is a very difficult topic. I spent more than a day to think about my idea.

In the game, you have a bag of coins. You can build and upgrade stuff with them.

Natas, a slime king, will guide you on how to earn more and more coins.

But it is not the way to win. You need to find a way to win the game.

If you like my game please rate it and leave me a comment.

if you have any cool idea to improve the game, leave me a comment.

if you're not satisfy to play with the browser, you may download the Window version
